title: Academic English Distance Learning Design: Effective Instructional Design for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and foundational academic competencies at the university level
context.additional_context: An academic English proficiency enhancement program for in-service professionals, integrating research paper analysis and presentation skills in mathematics.

learning_goals: Learners can independently analyze three or more academic English research papers.
Learners can deliver presentations explaining mathematical concepts in English during Zoom-based real-time classes.
Learners can complete two academic writing projects based on peer evaluation and instructor feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
